title: Foundations: Command Line Basics
description: Learn the basics of using a terminal or command line.

courses.title: Enchantment in the Command Line
courses.description: This is a magic ritual developed for people who want to understand their computer better, and use it in a more fulfilling way. It is designed to enchant your computer (and you) through the use of the terminal.

courses.title: Commands versus Buttons
courses.description: Understand the "command" paradigm as opposed to the "buttons" paradigm of using your computer.

courses.title: Grammar for Command-line Languages
courses.description: Learn the basic rules of grammar common to almost all command-line languages.
